rooms.description: Large open space with floor-to-ceiling windows to welcome natural light, designed in accordance with Vastu principles by placing the entrance on the auspicious east side.
A combined living and dining space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum natural light, ensuring an open plan layout with Kerala-style wooden beams and traditional carvings.
Modern yet traditional kitchen integrated into the living area. Vastu compliant placement to maintain proper energy flow; equipped with ample storage and natural light from windows.
A guest room designed for privacy, with floor-to-ceiling window views of the garden and pool area. Includes Kerala-style interior elements to maintain cultural integrity.

openings.description: A wide entrance door leading from the porch to the living space, following traditional Kerala architecture and Vastu guidelines for auspicious entry.
An open veranda area offering a transitional space between indoor and outdoor environments, featuring large windows that overlook the swimming pool area.
A dedicated opening to access the swimming pool area with floor-to-ceiling glass doors for unobstructed views of the pool.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom featuring Kerala-style wooden detailing, built-in wardrobes and a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural ventilation.
Additional bedroom ensuring joint family privacy, designed in traditional style with subtle modern amenities and Vastu-aligned layout.

openings.description: A balcony providing a serene view of the garden area, designed to facilitate natural air circulation in line with Vastu principles.
Winding staircase connecting the upper floor with the ground floor, incorporating traditional Kerala woodwork and safety measures as per modern building norms.
